activation.followSteps: Follow these simple steps to activate your eSIM and get connected instantly.

step1.title: Purchase Your Plan
step1.description: Choose your destination and data plan. Complete your purchase and receive QR code instantly.

step2.title: Access Device Settings
step2.description:
iOS: Go to Settings → Cellular → Add Cellular Plan
Android: Go to Settings → Network & Internet → Mobile Network → Add Carrier

step3.title: Scan QR Code
step3.description: Use your device camera or photo library to scan the QR code. Your phone will automatically detect and process the eSIM profile.

step4.title: You're Connected!
step4.description: Your eSIM is now active and ready to use. Switch between your plans in your device settings anytime.

faq.whatIsEsim: What is an eSIM and how does it work?
faq.whatIsEsimAnswer: An eSIM (embedded SIM) is a digital SIM card that's built into your device. Instead of inserting a physical SIM card, you can download and activate a cellular plan directly onto your device. This allows you to switch between carriers and plans without needing to swap physical cards.
faq.deviceSupportAnswer: Most modern smartphones support eSIM, including iPhone XS and newer, Google Pixel 3 and newer, Samsung Galaxy S20 and newer, and many others. Check your device settings or contact us to confirm compatibility.
faq.howToActivate: How do I activate my eSIM?
faq.howToActivateAnswer: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code via email. Simply scan this code with your device's camera in the cellular settings, and your eSIM will be activated automatically. Detailed instructions are provided for each device type.
faq.paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and various local payment methods depending on your region.
faq.refundPolicy: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
faq.refundPolicyAnswer: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for unused data plans. If you haven't activated your eSIM or used any data, you can request a full refund within 7 days of purchase.
faq.unlimitedData: Do your plans include unlimited data?
faq.unlimitedDataAnswer: We offer both limited and unlimited data plans. Unlimited plans may have fair usage policies or speed throttling after certain thresholds, which are clearly stated in the plan details.
faq.notConnecting: My eSIM isn't connecting to the network. What should I do?
faq.notConnectingAnswer: First, ensure you're in an area with network coverage. Try restarting your device, toggling airplane mode on/off, or manually selecting the network in your cellular settings. If issues persist, contact our support team.
faq.slowSpeed: Why is my data speed slower than expected?
faq.slowSpeedAnswer: Data speeds can vary based on network congestion, your location, device capabilities, and plan type. Some plans may have speed limitations or throttling after certain usage thresholds.
faq.callsSms: Can I use my eSIM for calls and SMS?
faq.callsSmsAnswer: Our eSIM plans are primarily data-only. However, you can use VoIP services like WhatsApp, Skype, or FaceTime for calls and messaging over your data connection.
faq.checkUsage: How do I check my data usage?
faq.checkUsageAnswer: You can monitor your data usage through your device's settings or our mobile app. We also send notifications when you're approaching your data limit.
faq.deleteEsim: How do I delete an eSIM from my device?
faq.deleteEsimAnswer: Go to your device's cellular settings, select the eSIM plan you want to remove, and choose 'Delete eSIM' or 'Remove Plan'. This will permanently delete the eSIM from your device.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.description: Find answers to popular questions about our eSIM services

questions.q: What is eSIM and how does it work?
questions.a: eSIM is an embedded SIM built into your device. Instead of a physical SIM, plan data is loaded onto your phone via QR code, so you can activate mobile service without swapping cards.
Most modern smartphones and tablets support eSIM, including iPhone XR and newer, Samsung Galaxy S20 and newer, Google Pixel 3 and newer, and many others.

questions.q: How do I activate my eSIM?
questions.a: After purchase you receive a QR code. Go to cellular settings on your device, choose "Add cellular plan" or "Add eSIM" and scan the QR code. Follow the on-screen instructions.

questions.q: Do I need to remove my physical SIM card?
questions.a: No. eSIM works alongside your physical SIM. You can use both or switch between them in settings.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept major credit and debit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods. All transactions are protected with bank-level encryption.

questions.q: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
questions.a: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support within 30 days of purchase.

questions.q: Do your plans include unlimited data?
questions.a: Plans vary by data allowance. Some offer large data packs; all have fair use to ensure quality for everyone.

questions.q: How long is my eSIM plan valid?
questions.a: Validity depends on the plan you choose, from 7 to 30 days. You'll get a reminder before the plan expires.

questions.q: My eSIM won't connect. What should I do?
questions.a: Make sure eSIM is activated in device settings, turn on "Data roaming", and restart the device. If it still fails, check coverage or contact us.

questions.q: Why is my data speed slower than expected?
questions.a: Speed can vary by location, network load, and device. In some areas it may be lower than in others.

questions.q: Can I use eSIM for calls and SMS?
questions.a: Most of our plans are data-only. For calls and SMS we recommend VoIP apps like WhatsApp, Skype, or FaceTime.

questions.q: In which countries does GlobalBanka work?
questions.a: We offer coverage in 200+ countries worldwide, including Europe, Asia, North and South America, Africa, and the Middle East.

questions.q: Can I use one eSIM in multiple countries?
questions.a: Yes. Many plans offer multi-country coverage so you can use one eSIM across several countries in a region without buying separate plans.

faqPage.contactSupportText: Can't find the answer? Our support team is here to help.
